commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Sorry for calling you two over out of nowhere.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: It's no trouble at all. So, what do you need?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: How about we all have a party sometime soon?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: A party?! That sounds fun!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Wow, that's a great idea! But why a party?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Well, since we're all acquainted with each other, I thought we could get a little closer through a fun gathering? Or, is that weird?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: That isn't weird at all! I think it's a great idea!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I think it's a good idea, too. I think everyone will enjoy it.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: And what's more, I want us to keep the party a secret until the day of.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: So it's a surprise party?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Yeah, one of those! What do you think?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I think it'll be really exciting! I'm sure everyone will be thrilled.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I wonder if I can keep quiet until the party day, though? I'm kinda scared I'll run my mouth!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Ahaha. You know, me too.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: So what kind of party is this actually going to be?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Ahaha. Well, I haven't decided that just yet. Anyone have any good ideas?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: A surprise party is all about the surprise! We've got to trick our guests!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Trick them?! Hey, that sounds fun! We want to go with something that has a big impact, too, that they'll never forget!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Like, what if they open the door and they find a crime scene! And as they're scrambling about looking for clues...

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: ...Ace Detective Honoka and her friends find a key clue at the crime scene, an alpaca poster!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Hold on a second, I want to be an ace detective, too!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Very well, you get to be an ace detective, too! How about you, Ayumu?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Ahaha. I'm fine with just being one of the friends. Still, this seems like it'll be a pretty big undertaking. Can we really take care of this ourselves?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Hmm. It does seem like it'd be tough with just us, so how about we get more people in on this?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Okay! I'll ask if You can help us out.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: I'll check with Kotori, then. I'm sure we'll come up with a good idea if there are five of us!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: All right, let's put our heads together and make this a success!

commands.speaker: Chika, Ayumu
commands.line: Yeah!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh, and let's all be really careful that we don't let this slip to anyone, okay?

commands.speaker: Honoka, Chika
commands.line: Y-Yeah.
